divs: Sighting DetailsMUFON !!! agin today like around the same time as yesterday its the same ufo !! cruising it over Pomona !!!and agin it flew right in front of the airplane mabe if u guys call ontario airport they might of reported seeing it .. i thought it was gonna crash into it.. then it slowly started fadeing away till it disappeared !!! i took pics wit my fone agin so just zoom in an look good at the one weir theirs two lights close to each other ones the ufo an the other is the airplane!!
